name: WAVLINK USB4 to 10Gbps Ethernet Adapter, USB-C to 10G Ethernet Network Adapter with AQC113 Chip, Supports Thunderbolt 3/4/5 & USB4, for Mac, Windows & Linux (Driver Required on Windows & Linux)
short_description: 【True 10Gbps Wired Performance】 The USB-C to 10GbE adapter unlocks up to 10Gbps ultra-fast Ethernet speeds for demanding workflows like 4K/8K video editing, NAS access, large file transfers, virtualization, and multi-gig fiber internet. Delivers low-latency, stable, wired connectivity when connected to a full 10G network environment

【Designed for USB4 & Thunderbolt 3/4/5】 Built specifically for next-generation USB4 and Thunderbolt ports, this USB4 10G Ethernet adapter supports USB4, Thunderbolt 3, Thunderbolt 4, and Thunderbolt 5 devices. Perfect for modern laptops and desktops without built-in Ethernet. Mac OS includes native drivers. Windows 10/11 and Linux require manual driver installation(Driver download instructions are included in the package and available on the WAVLINK official website.). Not compatible with Windows with USB 3.2 ports only or mobile phones or tablets

【Necessary for 10G Speed】 1.Broadband speed must exceed 10G; 2. Modem/Router should support 10G network output; 3. Ethernet cable needs to be of CAT6A or higher grade; 4. Connect to a laptop port that is USB4/Thunderbolt 3/4/5; 5.Internet speed depends on your service plan. For seeking maximum throughput in local 10G environments, optimal results may require system-level settings such as disabling Flow Control, enabling Jumbo Frames, enabling hardware offloading, and confirming 10G full-duplex across all devices. Note: Actual speed depends on your 10G-capable router/switch, Ethernet cable (Cat6a/Cat7), network interface, system configuration, and network environment

【Adaptive Multi-Gig Speed Compatibility】 Automatically negotiates network speeds from 10Gbps / 5Gbps / 2.5Gbps / 1Gbps / 100Mbps / 10Mbps with no manual configuration required. The 10gbps ethernet adapter ensures reliable performance across mixed network environments and future-proofs your setup

【Advanced AQC113-B1 Controller】 Powered by the high-performance AQC113-B1 chipset, this 10Gb USB-C Ethernet adapter delivers consistent throughput, low latency, and stable connections under heavy workloads—Designed for long-duration transfers with no packet drops, no throttling, and no random disconnects. Please download and install the driver software(Marvell AQtion Driver)!

【Compact Aluminum Design with LED Status】 The USB-C to 10GbE network adapter with premium aluminum alloy housing provides efficient passive heat dissipation for stable long-term operation. Slim, portable design fits easily in your bag—ideal for studios, offices, and remote work. Dual LED indicators show link speed and data activity at a glance
